mapper.select: /* SysCodeGroup.selectList */ SELECT A.PRE_CD ,B.CODE_NM ,A.REF1_CONFIG ,A.REF2_CONFIG ,A.REF3_CONFIG ,A.REF4_CONFIG ,A.REF5_CONFIG ,A.USE_YN ,A.COM_YN ,A.MEMO ,A.CREATER ,A.CREATE_DT ,A.CHANGER ,A.CHANGE_DT ,A.CHANGE_IP FROM SYS_CODE_GROUP A LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT PRE_CD,CODE_NM FROM SYS_CODE_LOCALE WHERE CODE ='0000000000' AND LOCALE_CD IN( SELECT REF1 FROM SYS_CODE WHERE PRE_CD='COM_000003' AND CODE ='DEFAULT' ) )B ON(B.PRE_CD = A.PRE_CD)

/* SysCodeGroup.selectLocaleList */ SELECT A.COMPANY, A.PRE_CD, B.LOCALE_CD, A.CODE, B.CODE_NM, A.REF1, A.REF2, A.REF3, A.REF4, A.REF5, A.SORT, B.MEMO, A.CREATER, A.CREATE_DT, A.CHANGER, A.CHANGE_DT, A.CHANGE_IP FROM SYS_CODE A, SYS_CODE_LOCALE B WHERE A.COMPANY = B.COMPANY AND A.PRE_CD = B.PRE_CD AND A.CODE = B.CODE AND A.CODE='0000000000' ORDER BY A.PRE_CD , A.SORT
